title: High ping problems?
body:
Recently i have stopped playing league due to very high ping spikes (up to 1300). i consider this an abnormality because in the past i have had very good internet. the thing that confuses me most is that my laptop is the only device in my house getting ping spikes. i have tried all the packet loss suggestions but nothings working. one more abnormality is that a few of my friends have been getting the exact same problems. i even asked some teammates in game and some said they have had the same problems. any suggestions?

P.S. i also downloaded the repair tool and it said everything was OK. i then reinstalled any nothing changed

replies.body:
This may be an issue with your laptop's network adapter or it could be an issue along your network routing. To narrow down what's causing this, we'll first need you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can confirm all your localized network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if you still see issues so we can dive into this further.
thanks sooo much all my problems have been resolved ty ty{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
